attributes.action: Investigate the only inexpensive way of improving public health.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Which we believe is to change the energy environment people live  and work in that can’t be seen or heard. As recommended in the None ionizing radiation directive of the  ECC for workplaces 2012, but which has not been investigated in homes where people spend a greater portion of their lives.
